name: Miss Blink (Episode 1)
description:
However misguided, like most teens, Gina wants to get out of her hometown. But how? It's up to you to find her a ride to the show in Meredosia, where maybe she'll meet someone who wants to take her to their home, where she might live forever. What could go wrong?

Controls are:

Z: Confirm/Use Selected Tool

X: Toggle Control of Tool Panel

Arrows: Move

To Save/Quit: Use your Diary

To Adjust Audio: Use the Stereo in your bedroom. 

Also: I had 10 days to make this little adventure game for the Waltzing Game Jam 3. It fits the theme of Taking Control, and also Attraction and Repulsion (per the jam). But also... doesn't every adventure deal with some sort of Chain Reaction? 

Before I make the complete adventure, there will be an update of this (episode of this) game. I want the characters, especially Gina, to have more emotes. I also want to tighten up the controls and interface. But here it is.
